segments.text: My eyes keep going back to the sink, it's just unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running full blast, absolutely gushing from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not just full; it's pouring over the front edge in a constant sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A huge puddle is forming on the floor, getting wider by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the cabinet doors are already soaked from the runoff.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that water spreading under her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is so calm, so utterly unaware of the flood she's standing in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause serious damage to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor must be getting really slippery now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip and fall if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a disaster waiting to happen right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn her about the overflowing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water is incredible to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me cringe to think about the mess this will create.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR
